Body.Content:
If you’re an IT professional or decision maker, start using the newest Windows 11 capabilities with helpful tips and actionable steps summarized in one place. Read this month’s recap of improvements in Windows security, device management, Windows Server, productivity and collaboration, lifecycle milestones, and preview opportunities. Get started with Secure Boot protections, checkpoint cumulative updates, security baselines and cross-region disaster recovery for Windows 365, Windows Server preview opportunities, IoT LTSC, and other improvements released in July. 
 
When will this happen: 
All improvements summarized in this monthly recap are already available. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
Whatever tools you use, you can start seeing improvements across various workflows in your organization with: 
  • Secure Boot protections 
  • Checkpoint cumulative updates for Windows 11 
  • Security baselines for Windows 365 
  • Cross-region disaster recovery for Windows 365 
  • Windows Server hotpatch baseline and preview opportunities 
  • IoT LTSC 
  • Other improvements released in July 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
Read the new monthly recap and additional information to start benefiting from the latest improvements. 
 
Additional information: 
Read the monthly recap at Windows news you can use: July 2024. It includes highlights from the following channels: 
  • Windows resiliency: Best practices and the path forward 
  • July 2024 security update for Windows 11, version 23H2 
  • Windows IT Pro Blog 
  • Windows OS Platform Blog 
  • Microsoft Intune Blog 
  • Windows Insider Blog

Title: Get started with July 2024 improvements in Windows 11
